attributes.review: When I tell you I was shook, shocked, baffled and befuddled by this app?! I truly mean it! It took 525,600 minutes to download and once it FINALLY did, the strangest thing happened. 😰Can you believe that this app turned my ENTIRE PHONE ORANGE!? 🤯 And made it wreak of racism and bigotry!? 😳 I contemplated throwing my phone in the trash (where racism and bigotry belong) but I decided to undownload the app instead. 🥵 ONE STAR 😏😤🤬😋😤😡😌💘😉
attributes.title: WHAT IN TARNATION!?

attributes.review: This app crashed every single time i opened it...... ...... on the few occasions it worked a million pop ups came up. if this could be rated a lower number i absolutely would give it a 0 star. The way this app ran is just like how our, non racist🧚🏼🧚🏿✨, non homophobic✨🌈, non sexist 👯‍♀️president runs our county!!!!! i officially am VOTING FOR BIDEN! GEN Z STRONG✊🏼✊🏽✊🏾✊🏿🤜🏼🤛🏿

attributes.review: This app is absolutely terrible. Not only did it not allow me to get past the first page where you need put in your phone number, but the Terms and Policies wasn’t opening up for me to read through as I typically do before downloading any app. I’ve never had such a bad experience with an app.

attributes.title: d i s g u s t a n g

attributes.review: Well, first off the app took a full 72 hours to download, and after it finished downloading it spread a virus to my phone. The virus was so bad I had to go buy a new phone. The app also caused my screen to go black whenever running, and caused my other apps to run slower. All in all, this app is a very slow, unhelpful, disgusting app.
attributes.title: This app is disgusting
